Stamp - Annotation Type in src.java.nineci.greenbill
Annotation used for gorm domain classes that should have the following proerties createdBy/createdDate/editedBy/editedDate and default id mapping as well as table name pluralization
StampASTTransformation - Class in src.java.nineci.greenbill
Performs an ast transformation on a class - adds createdBy/createdDate editedBy/EditedDate id and table properties to the subject class.
StampASTTransformation() - Constructor in StampASTTransformation
